str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To translate, interpret, explain. From dia and hermeneuo; to explain thoroughly, by implication, to translate.
